p: Model A significantly predicted pro-environmental intention, F(5, 168) = 20.08, p < 0.001, with a large effect size (according to Cohen, 2013), R2 = 0.37 (adjusted R2 = 0.36). Observer sensitivity (positive) and moral disengagement (negative) were significant predictors. All effects were in the hypothesized direction and, therefore, Hypotheses 1a and 2a were partially supported.
